game_description: Have you ever wanted to be a circle? Well, your dream has come true in Circle Game! In this cartoonish and fun game, there are very silly and non-serious places you can visit. Such as: a forest, a beach, a very cool credit room, a hamster cage, and a mysterious cave... There are more updates and other silly stuff coming sometime in the future! Join the discord for development updates and stupid fun overall!: https://discord.gg/VNs8KsDS4W
review_1: Bro it’s good I’m not gonna lie definitely sick
review_3: please download I LOVE CRICLES cirl yuh
review_5: After five minutes of playing a moderator and the owner joined! It was amazing! But then my oculus died. But overall the game is really fun and I recommend playing.
